tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Inventory (
    inventory_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES Materials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Inventory (
    inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES Glass(glass_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES Plastic(plastic_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES Paper(paper_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE inventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES glass_materials(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES plastic_materials(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES paper_materials(id)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT,
    transaction_date DATE,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(255),
    quantity_change INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES inventory(material_id)
);
